name: Cubix world
description:
The main character is a cube

Jump on the platforms, reach the end and try not to die because the creators of the levels that you are like will do everything so that you can not pass them

Control: In the editor

MMB(Middle mouse button) - moving the camera

RMB - rotate the camera

LMB - put, delete, select (depending on the tool)

In the game

LMB - jump

Other

There are no prepared levels in the game yet that you can pass without starting to study the editor, but on my own I added my level to the folder with levels, which is located in the same place as the game, which I did during the test

Please subscribe me:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNxc6CuyJ5FkqeMVBHUjmZg
